DataElement.preferredName: Study Time Point Description DICOM Short Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of a set of one or more studies that are grouped together to represent a clinical trial point or submission in a clinical trial.  [Standard-based]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care._A statement that represents a specific point in the time continuum of research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects.  [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredDefinition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.

Concepts.definition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/18/13 removed caBIG ACRIN PET CSI. jc  12/9/08 - released post VCDE Interim Silver Review changes; replaced Clinical Trial CUI (C15207 to C71104).  8/28/07 updated def, short name, added reference to NCIA CDEs.  6/6/07 -DEC created to support DICOM CDE task utilizing IE Â¿ DICOM Attribute terms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: ST:  DICOM Short Text; A character string that may contain one or more paragraphs. It may contain the Graphic Character set and the Control Characters, CR, LF, FF, and ESC. Data Elements with this DICOM Value Representation shall not be multi-valued

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive set of standards for communications between medical imaging devices, including handling, storing and transmitting information in medical imaging. It includes a file format definition and a network communication protocol.:Having little (physical) length or seeming to be limited in (temporal) duration.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A comprehensive set of standards for communications between medical imaging devices, including handling, storing and transmitting information in medical imaging. It includes a file format definition and a network communication protocol.
Having little (physical) length or seeming to be limited in (temporal) duration.

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 6/21/07 - released for curation of NCIA DEs. 5/31/07-Create for CDEs using the DICOM Date format; based on 2007 DICOM Standard, section 3.

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 11/18/13 removed caBIG ACRIN PET CSI. jc  12/9/08 - released post VCDE Interim Silver Review changes.  5/7/08 - Add ACRIN PET CSI.  8/28/07  CDE created to support DICOM CDE IE & DICOM Attribute-DICOM VR Rep term format.
